023
024package org.opt4j.core.optimizer;
025
026import org.opt4j.core.config.Icons;
027import org.opt4j.core.config.annotations.Category;
028import org.opt4j.core.config.annotations.Icon;
029import org.opt4j.core.start.Opt4JModule;
030
031/**
032 * Abstract module class for the {@link Optimizer} modules.
033 * 
034 * @author lukasiewycz
035 * @see Optimizer
036 * @see IterativeOptimizer
037 * 
038 */
039@Icon(Icons.OPTIMIZER)
040@Category
041public abstract class OptimizerModule extends Opt4JModule {
042
043        /**
044         * Binds the given {@link Optimizer}.
045         * 
046         * @param optimizer
047         *            the optimizer to bind
048         */
049        protected void bindOptimizer(Class<? extends Optimizer> optimizer) {
050                bind(Optimizer.class).to(optimizer).in(SINGLETON);
051        }
052
053        /**
054         * Binds the given {@link IterativeOptimizer}.
055         * 
056         * @param optimizer
057         *            the iterative optimizer to bind
058         */
059        protected void bindIterativeOptimizer(Class<? extends IterativeOptimizer> optimizer) {
060                bind(IterativeOptimizer.class).to(optimizer).in(SINGLETON);
061        }
062
063}
